Looking forward to seeing some familiar faces (hopefully!) Went to school/ college/ played football (peaked with @stalbanscityfc  youth) worked/ drank in pubs/ lived in wonderful Saint A nearly all my life. Love this place. Come see me for catch up and footy chat. https://t.co/j3ND5d217x

@JanAageFjortoft Jan, majority of the time managers state/claim the player is being “rested” or “rotated” because they can’t say publicly “He’s been crap lately”. My keen sense of journalism leads me to suspect that isn’t the case here.

urls.title: Geoff Shreeves (@geoffshreeves__) • Instagram reel
urls.description: Geoff Shreeves shared a post on Instagram: "Fabulous fun to host alongside @laurawoodsy this years Male Legends of football award to Gareth Southgate and female award to @ellsbells89 . In aid of @nordoffrobbins a smashing total of £290,000 . Our entertainment for the evening was the superb @jamesbaymusic . To all those who came and supported, Cheers - Geoff". Follow their account to see 221 posts.

data.text: Incredible evening to honour ⁦@GarethSouthgate⁩ & ⁦@ellsbells89⁩ being inducted into the ⁦@LoFootball⁩ hall of fame.  https://t.co/BCMSdfXpdw

Thanks Jim and also for all your support for @LoFootball https://t.co/xlIyRYbsNX

tweets.text: @FOXSportsPR @FOXSoccer @JohnStrong @stuholden @JennyTaft @IanDarke @landondonovan @RaeComm @alywagner @GeoffShreeves @DrJoeMachnik Congrats to Fox Soccer's fine announcing teams. My favorite play by player announcer is Ian Darke, who's a knowledge resource & provides amazing game history, player & team details.  As an NFL fan, I appreciate the education. Looking forward to John & Allie.
it can't be a coincidence that Infantino is put on the TV within the first five minutes of every game - imagine demanding that as part of being President of FIFA.

So sad. I was working main door at Anfield the morning news filtered through, Gary had been at Anfield a week or 2 before - it was @GeoffShreeves who through teary eyes told us the sad news before it was made public - fair to say we were absolutely saddened and lost for words. https://t.co/5AFdLANTY6
England being outplayed, outrun and out thought here.

Just finished @GeoffShreeves book. Thoroughly recommend it, some of the stories and people involved are jaw dropping. 

Today on @AK90s we got to chat with Geoff, when my failing internet allowed! and I still wonder how this pub idea lead me to that point! 🤣

@FootballCliches @CDEccleshare @GeoffShreeves A manager cannot have won one point from a possible nineteen. Surely eighteen or twenty one?
@FootballCliches @CDEccleshare @GeoffShreeves Greatest episode so far, loving Geoff getting at Adam. Bring him on more often.

THE
𝗙𝗢𝗢𝗧𝗕𝗔𝗟𝗟 𝗖𝗟𝗜𝗖𝗛𝗘𝗦
PODCAST

With me & @CDEccleshare for 𝑴𝒆𝒔𝒖𝒕 𝑯𝒂𝒂𝒍𝒂𝒏𝒅 𝑫𝒊𝒄𝒌𝒔 is FA Cup engraving data enthusiast, managers-in-sunglasses lobbyist, alleged relative of Peter Shreeve(s) & Sky Sports Chief Touchline Reporter @GeoffShreeves

@phoenix66sta @GeoffShreeves @stalbanscityfc @FleetvilleJnr @verulamschool @VerulamGC ……so is pic 2🙄
I’m currently in hospital and just had pain meds. I’m not senile. No sir. Not me. Not losing it at all🤣

@GeoffShreeves @stalbanscityfc @FleetvilleJnr @verulamschool @VerulamGC What years were you at school Geoff? Me, Camp JMI 1964-70, Marshalswick 70-76, St. Albans College and Hatfield Poly thereafter. Phoenix FC. Boot, Fleur, Rats Castle, etc. happy, happy days😊

Terrific evening celebrating @GeoffShreeves new book. Terrific read - his stories about Sir Alex are fascinating. He's been doing his job so well for so long, some great tales to tell. https://t.co/UvfsDpixYS
@GeoffShreeves @Sir_NG @FleetvilleJnr @verulamschool @stalbanscityfc @VerulamGC He was a @CityYouthFC boy …as we all were!  👌🏻⚽️

@GeoffShreeves @FleetvilleJnr @verulamschool @stalbanscityfc @VerulamGC Come on St.Albans. Pop along and support one of our own 🟡🔵
@GeoffShreeves @FleetvilleJnr @verulamschool @stalbanscityfc @VerulamGC Never realised you were a hometown boy Geoff 💪

Make sure you're in store Saturday 15th because none other than @GeoffShreeves will be here signing his new book 'Cheers, Geoff!' from 11:30am!

@CarolBl51188457 @Andyshowbiz @BuenoHW @BBC3CR @GeoffShreeves Oh no....I just realised I didn't take a picture 🤦🏻‍♀️ This is what it looked like before it went back into the kiln (it's the one at the back) https://t.co/D6F47miCwp

WHAT A HOOT!  Today's fun courtesy of @Andyshowbiz @BuenoHW @BBC3CR and special guest @GeoffShreeves.  Kerplonker was so controversial, the final word had to go to #AlanShearer. Clearly I took one for the team 😂 https://t.co/j0s2yT3AuB
@yourgolftravel @GeoffShreeves @Bucksgolfclub @AP_McCoy Awful follow through, need to work on that Geoff 😘

Based on his golf swing can you guess  @AP_McCoy’s handicap? ⛳️

@RacingBreaks 🏇 https://t.co/vSZqdtILAw
@GeoffShreeves Is it on Audible Geoff ?
Cracking read by a brilliant reporter. Congrats ⁦@GeoffShreeves⁩ - loved it. 👏👏👏 https://t.co/3Hj20pY040
@GeoffShreeves @HKane Can only imagine some of the responses you’re going to get on this one, Geoff. A lot of haters out there
Ryan Sessegnon and Harry Kane say today's win was for their fitness coach, Gian Piero Ventrone, who died aged 61 this week. https://t.co/UYPVfvSCFf

urls.title: League Managers Association - JOHN DUNCAN: FEBRUARY 1949 - OCTOBER 2022

tweets.text:
The whole team at the League Managers Association is devastated that our close friend and colleague, LMA member John Duncan, has passed away at the age of 73. He died peacefully at home surrounded by loved ones.

Full statement ➡️ https://t.co/yjUhZI4GFL https://t.co/hvWFSDBczK

urls.title: Shreeves on untold stories from Fergie incident to almost drowning Charlie Adam
urls.description: EXCLUSIVE: In a new book the broadcaster and touchline reporter has opened up on some untold stories from his career including a lift in Mick Jagger's private jet and interviewing Kevin Costner

tweets.text:
Geoff Shreeves has built a reputation for refusing to shirk the toughest subjects | @MullockSMirror 

https://t.co/J1YQ3UsSnu
Enjoyed spending a few hours in the company of @GeoffShreeves this week. His new book is a cracker https://t.co/jg92XEaUP6

@JohnFerrara64 I didn’t John but my father’s and brother’s businesses were/are based there so have been going for over 3 decades. Don’t bother trying to book, they don’t answer the phone and if they don’t know you they don’t let you in!!!
@GeoffShreeves What school did you go to in Clerkenwell then Geoff?

Join us on Tuesday 18th Oct for an evening with @GeoffShreeves, recalling his career and tales from the Premier League touchline. Tickets £20 including a copy of #CheersGeoff. Doors open at 6pm. Venue TBD Call 01270 611665 or email steve@nantwichbookshop.co.uk to book! https://t.co/EieAgZls1S
@GeoffShreeves @Matt_Law_DT Hinge and brackett
@GeoffShreeves @Matt_Law_DT Nooooo! He’s the Teddy to your Alan….

Next weeks event with @GeoffShreeves and @Matt_Law_DT is sold out and we have 8 tickets left for the incredibly moving evening with @willashon and @fugueur ( John Rogers) on Thursday
And we have Evan Parker and @peterurpeth next Saturday! What an incredible week at the Tap

Really enjoyed the Legends of Football @LoFootball event last night raising money for such a good cause @nordoffrobbins 

Well deserved awards for Ellen White & Gareth Southgate with impressive acceptance speeches from both.

Thanks so much for the invite @GeoffShreeves https://t.co/VzJj6ZqA4Y
This will be fun to read. Top tales from a top bloke... https://t.co/h8dIQ4l8DN
